tool_description: ubisoft (game, store, news, entertainments and many more)
name: ubisoft
title: ubisoft

api_list.name: get entertainment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ubisoft.p.rapidapi.com/entertainment/education-event"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ubisoft.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ubisoft.p.rapidapi.com/entertainment/{category}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ubisoft.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get news
